languages.text:
Base Armour Property: +15 Strength
Wearer takes -50% warp damage.
Once per round, after the wearer takes damage, the armor unleashes a lightning strike that deals {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all other units within a 2-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Base Armour Property: +15 Strength
Wearer takes -50% warp damage.
Once per round, after the wearer takes damage, the armor unleashes a lightning strike that deals {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all other units within a 2-cell radius.

languages.text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}が50%減少する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内で初めてダメージを受けると、この鎧は雷撃を放つ。この雷撃は半径2セル以内のすべての生物に{uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132}のダメージを与える。 基本アーマー特性：+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}が50%減少する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}内で初めてダメージを受けると、この鎧は雷撃を放つ。この雷撃は半径2セル以内のすべての生物に{uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132}のダメージを与える。 基本アーマー特性：+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。

languages.text: L'utilisateur subit −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}. La première fois que l'utilisateur subit des dégâts lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cette armure génère un éclair infligeant {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} points de dégâts à toutes les créatures se trouvant dans un rayon de 2 cases. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur subit −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}. La première fois que l'utilisateur subit des dégâts lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cette armure génère un éclair infligeant {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} points de dégâts à toutes les créatures se trouvant dans un rayon de 2 cases. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: El portador sufre un −50 % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}. Cuando el portador sufre daño por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, esta armadura libera una descarga eléctrica que inflige {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} de daño a todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador sufre un −50 % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}. Cuando el portador sufre daño por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, esta armadura libera una descarga eléctrica que inflige {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} de daño a todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者受到的{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}降低50%。 当装备者在每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次受到伤害时，此护甲会释放出一道闪电，对2格内的所有生物造成{uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132}点伤害。 基础护甲特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者受到的{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}降低50%。 当装备者在每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次受到伤害时，此护甲会释放出一道闪电，对2格内的所有生物造成{uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132}点伤害。 基础护甲特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Giyen kişi, %50 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır. Giyen kişi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez hasar aldığında zırh, bir yıldırım çıkararak 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklara {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} hasar verir. Taban zırh özelliği: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, %50 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır. Giyen kişi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez hasar aldığında zırh, bir yıldırım çıkararak 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklara {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} hasar verir. Taban zırh özelliği: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.

languages.text: Der Träger erleidet −50 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Erleidet der Träger in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals Schaden, feuert diese Rüstung einen gleißenden Blitz ab, der allen Kreaturen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} Schaden zufügt. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erleidet −50 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Erleidet der Träger in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals Schaden, feuert diese Rüstung einen gleißenden Blitz ab, der allen Kreaturen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} Schaden zufügt. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: Персонаж получает на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}. Когда персонаж получает урон впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, его броня реагирует ударом молнии, нанося каждому существу в радиусе 2 клеток {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} урона. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает на −50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}. Когда персонаж впервые в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} получает урон, его броня реагирует ударом молнии, поражая всех существ в радиусе 2 клеток и нанося им {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} урона. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Персонаж получает на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}. Когда персонаж получает урон впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, его броня реагирует ударом молнии, нанося каждому существу в радиусе 2 клеток {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} урона. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
